p.k: No stranger to jazz club Moods, Shabaka Hutchings has appeared there with The Comet is Coming and Sons of Kemet. He returns with The Ancestors, a South African band that generates a profound vibe in the wake of John Coltrane's spiritual jazz.
p.d: Since its opening in 1992, jazz club Moods has developed into one of Zurich's largest and most prominent cultural venues. At the same time, it has become one of Europe's prominent jazz clubs which today enjoys a well-deserved worldwide reputation among musicians and critics. The venue books a large variety of genres, ranging from jazz and soul to electronic and international music. No stranger to jazz club Moods, Shabaka Hutchings has appeared here with The Comet is Coming and Sons of Kemet. He returns with The Ancestors, a South African band that generates a profound vibe in the wake of John Coltrane's spiritual jazz.
